item.description:
Lee Trevino with the perfect cap to golf in 2025 with this post-round interview for the ages. The intersection of golf and culture. Behind every drained putt or hosel rocket into the stands is a human being with complex emotions‚Äîamong them, an insatiable appetite for golf. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôre after. Golf‚Äôs humanity is what makes it so special to us. There have never been more reasons to love this game, and we‚Äôre endeavoring to explore them all. item.description:
We golf in the land Down Under! Welcome to Golf Diaries, where Skratch takes you to amazing courses and happenings around the world of golf and beyond. On this edition, our Man at Work and resident Aussie, Zane Moulton, showcases Melbourne where he gets a great sense of the current golf culture around the iconic Australian Open, headlined this year by Grand Slam winner Rory McIlroy.
